title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter giving Ollama chat, embed, tool-calling nodes.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-like web UI for any Ollama model; plugins, RAG, multi-user.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Lightweight CLI copilot that talks to Ollama for inline shell suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example: chunk documents, embed with Ollama, query with Llama 2.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Experimental multi-agent framework using Ollama models for tool-using agents.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Vim plugin that adds Llama-based code completions via local Ollama server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU nodes.

title: ollama4j (Java SDK)
summary: Community Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and strongly-typed responses.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via any Ollama model.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama; mention the bot to chat locally.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Llama-based note Q&A and summarization.

title: ollama-npm (unofficial CLI wrapper)
summary: Thin npm wrapper that downloads and manages the Ollama binary for CI/CD.

title: ollama-models (HuggingFace mirror)
summary: Community-curated list of GGUF models tested with Ollama and import scripts.

title: reddit/r/ollama - weekly discussion
summary: Active subreddit sharing new models, Docker tips, and GPU benchmarks.

title: Hacker News: Show HN - Ollama WebUI
summary: Discussion thread on the open-source ChatGPT-like UI for Ollama.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: Experimental gRPC proxy in front of Ollama’s REST API for high-throughput services.
